background: Production-ready implementation of secure AWS infrastructure using Terraform HCL. Implements three-tier architecture with VPC across multiple AZs, Auto Scaling Group for EC2 instances, encrypted RDS MySQL with KMS CMK, versioned S3 buckets with encryption, least-privilege IAM roles (no wildcard permissions), AWS Secrets Manager for credential management, and comprehensive CloudTrail/CloudWatch monitoring. HTTPS-only security group, Multi-AZ deployment, NAT Gateways for private subnet egress, and complete compliance with security best practices including automated password generation and secure secret storage.
